name: cypher-talker
description: Simple ES6/7-oriented lib to work with neo4j and (in future) with OpenCypher-compatible databases

scripts.preversion: git add lib/* test/* && npm run build && npm run test-against-build
scripts.postversion: jscs --fix lib && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -u origin master && npm publish && rm -rf ./build

author: Vsevolod Rodionov <vsevolod.rodionov@gmail.com>
